description: Schema for the dev.ocp.cart@1.0 capability. Its presence indicates the server supports stateful, server-side shopping carts with configurable lifecycle policies.

lifetimeSeconds.description: The duration in seconds that an inactive cart will be persisted by the server before being deleted. If null or omitted, carts do not expire.

maxItems.description: The maximum number of items allowed in a single cart. If omitted, there is no server-imposed limit.

maxConcurrentCarts.description: The maximum number of active carts a user can have simultaneously. If omitted, there is no limit.

persistencePolicy.description: How carts are persisted: 'session' (tied to browser session/cookie), 'user' (requires authentication, persists across sessions), 'anonymous' (temporary, no login required).

autoMergeOnLogin.description: Whether anonymous carts are automatically merged with authenticated user carts upon login. If omitted, merge behavior is server-specific.

errorSchemas.description: Standard RFC 9457-compliant error schemas for cart operations.

example.title: Cart Not Found
example.detail: Cart not found or has expired
